name: Apple - AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation - White
description: Shop Apple AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation White at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Very good, slightly overpriced.
reviews.reviewBody:
My full on detailed review after 3 days of use. 

Okay, first things first, ANC is solid for what the buds are and without the eartip. It has no issues knocking an aircon out of the room or the buzzing of a refrigerator.


Positives:
This may be apples SMALLEST available package of any electronics. 
The case itself is probably the smallest case ever released onto the open market, which makes it easily portably in a bag, a pocket, or a purse. This is also in my opinion, the BEST case on the market for these reasons.
These buds are COMFORTABLE so long as they fit. I had my girlfriend try these and she said they weren’t great, but I can happily wear these for their entire battery life with no ear fatigue. 
Finally, these have the best transparency mode of any buds I’ve ever tried (I’ve owned 8 or 9 wireless buds at this point in my life) and it honestly feels like I’m not wearing anything. 


Negatives:
For what these buds are, they’re overpriced for sure. These should be about $150 max. 
The buds themselves only have 4 hour battery lives, which means if you’re someone who wears buds at work or some other public environment, you’re gonna have to charge em at some point. 
ANC isn’t great, if you’re in a noisy area, you’re gonna have to turn your music or media up quite a lot to actually drown the noise out. This IS to be expected but it’s still a bit of a downside (still the best “open ear” ANC on the market though). 


Overall I’d give these an 8/10. They sound pretty good as all airpods have, they’re well built, and they provide a strong package.
Personally, I like them more than the AirPods Pro 2 but these are overpriced. If you’re debating on these or the pros 2 and don’t care about price, get the Pros 2, but if you’re looking for a good set of buds WITH AN APPLE DEVICE while also trying to save a buck, these are a great choice. (Pics below conpared to Airpods Pro 2 and Samsung Buds Pro 2)

reviews.name: Worth the upgrade
reviews.reviewBody: Love the fit of these over the airpods 3 they are a slightly smaller fit. Dont fall out of my ears & so comfortable over long periods of time. Definitely enjoying the new addition of the anc & transparency mode. They sound amazing with music and calls sound clear on the other end. If your looking to upgrade from older models definitely get these !!!

reviews.name: Love it
reviews.reviewBody: The sound quality is awesome. The case is slimmer than my previous pair. They fit nicely in my ears. They are a little more expensive than I would have liked. Overall, I am satisfied.

reviews.name: Best AirPods
reviews.reviewBody: Comfortable in the ears and fits better then I thought. I'm a bass head and these AirPods had really good bass. Awesome Active Noise Cancellation with the conversation awareness.

reviews.name: BUY IT
reviews.reviewBody: The sound quality is outstanding, and the amazing features are a good upgrade, delivering excellent functionality! Definitely worth it!

reviews.name: Air Pod 4
reviews.reviewBody: By Far, The Best Air Pods Ever… So Comfortable, I Fell Asleep And Forgot They Were In My Ear… ￼

reviews.name: Airpods4
reviews.reviewBody: They really good love all the features  pre-ordered ￼￼

reviews.name: Great Sound, But Fit Could Be Improved
reviews.reviewBody: I recently got the new Apple AirPods 4, and while I absolutely love the sound quality, I’m finding it hard to get a comfortable fit with the earpieces.  The fit feels loose.  I’ve tried adjusting them multiple times, but I can’t seem to find a perfect balance. It’s a bit disappointing, especially considering how great the sound is.

vid0.title: AppleCare+ for AirPods (Sold Separately)
vid0.ariaLabel: AppleCare+ for AirPods (Sold Separately) video 0 minutes 44 seconds
vid0.altText: AppleCare+ for AirPods (Sold Separately) video 0 minutes 44 seconds
vid0.transcript: [FUNKY INSTRUMENTAL POP MUSIC PLAYS]  A circle of red dots on a white background surrounds an AirPods Pro case and earbuds. The dots populate with a variety of app icons, emojis, and a transcribed voice message reading “Hey, where are you?”  Titles: Your AirPods make life more fun. But life is unpredictable.  The ring of dots and images spins upside down.  Titles: If something happens.  [CLATTERING]  A variety of icons surround a Memoji with glasses and short blond hair. The icons shake and fall to the ground. The Memoji looks around, mouth agape in shock.  Titles: Let AppleCare+ take care of it.  [DIGITAL KEYSTROKES]  Titles: We’ll fix them the right way with genuine Apple parts.   Two red dots land on the L in “Apple.” They swing down in an arc and push the word “parts” up into proper alignment.    [SNAPPING]   Titles: Or replace them even before you send yours back.  [DIGITAL KEYSTROKES]  A smiling face, astonished, and an exploding head emoji line up in a row.  Titles: with Express Replacement Service.  [STATIC]  Titles: Damages?   [ELECTRONIC GLITCHING]  The text fuzzes and distorts.   Repaired.   A red dot shoots down and forms a period.   [DING]  Titles: Service locations? Worldwide.  [JET ENGINE RUMBLING]  Location icons are scattered across a white checkered background.  Titles: Questions???  A Messages bubble appears.   Titles: Answered!  [MESSAGE SENT TONE]  Titles: by Apple Experts. So go live your life with less worry.  [CLICKING]  The Memoji surrounded by icons smiles broadly and nods.   Titles: It’s easy.  Multicolored oblong shapes converge and form the AppleCare+ logo.  Titles: Terms and Conditions including service fees apply and are subject to change. Repair service for damage is limited to accidental damage resulting from handling or use of the device. Descriptions of features are those available in the U.S. Feature availability and options may vary by country.

vid1.title: AirPods 4 Overview
vid1.transcript: [DRUM AND BASS MUSIC PLAYS]  Titles: All-new AirPods 4. Available in two models: AirPods 4 and AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation.  Concentric blue gradients enlarge to reveal a white background.  Titles: Iconic. Now supersonic.  Lyrics: Ahhh ehh.  Enlarged AirPods 4 hover over one another. The mesh of their speakers faces each other. Light shifts over the rear vent. Light reflects on the mirrored contour of the microphone. Left and right AirPods 4 twirl around each other.  Lyrics: Look up, look up, look up. Wanna move like that.  [ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION TONE]  Titles: Active Noise Cancellation. Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Audio, and Transparency mode are available only on AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation.  Lyrics: Move like dat. Move like dat. Ehhh ehhh ehh.  Against blue, orange, and purple backgrounds, the silhouette of a dancer wearing AirPods 4 pirouettes elegantly with their arms outstretched. Behind the dancer, layered circular shapes ripple rhythmically in the colors of the spaces.  Lyrics: Wanna move like that. Move like dat. Move like dat.  [ADAPTIVE TRANSPARENCY CHIME]  Titles: Adaptive Audio.  A mirror of the dancer appears as they continue to dance against the vibrant orange background.  Airport Staff: Flight 712 is now boarding.  Titles: Transparency mode.  Concentric rings transform from orange to purple and surround the dancer as they fluidly swing their arms.  Lyrics: I'm on my way. I’m on my way. Titles: Personalized Spatial Audio.  Lyrics: Ehhh ehhh ehh.  The dancer kicks their left leg up, leans back, and spins. Now, against a white background, the left AirPods earbud spins. A MagSafe Charging Case (USB‑C) turns from profile to straight-on, displaying a green charging light. It flips to reveal its charging port.  Titles: USB-C charging.  Lyrics: Move like dat. Move like dat.  A green lightning symbol expands around the case, progressively lighting up. Now, the AirPods 4 float, then tuck snugly into the MagSafe Charging Case.   Lyrics: Move like dat.  [CLICK]  The case closes. The case transforms into the Apple Logo. It vibrates to the beat and reverberates into gradient blue Apple logos.  [MUSIC FADES OUT]

answersForQuestion.answerText: No. Airpods 4 will not get the hearing aids update. Currently that is an Airpods Pro 2 exlusive update.
It looks like heating aid functionality will be limited to the AirPods Pro, so no. AirPods 4 will not include this health feature.

results.questionTitle: When is release date for the ANC Apple AirPods 4 I just preordered them to pick up at store I didn’t see a date.
Are there any accessories for the generation 4 air pods?
Which air pods work with an iPad Pro?
Do I need a separate charging cord?

Can I trade in my old Airpods for the new Airpods 4
?
Hi if you preorder a item can you pick up a day early
How compare to pro 2 ear phones?

answersForQuestion.answerText: Almost same. pro 2 have air tips and get hear aid update.  Airpods 4 not get that.

itemReviewed.name: Apple - AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation - White

name: Very good, slightly overpriced.
reviewBody:
My full on detailed review after 3 days of use. 

Okay, first things first, ANC is solid for what the buds are and without the eartip. It has no issues knocking an aircon out of the room or the buzzing of a refrigerator.


Positives:
This may be apples SMALLEST available package of any electronics. 
The case itself is probably the smallest case ever released onto the open market, which makes it easily portably in a bag, a pocket, or a purse. This is also in my opinion, the BEST case on the market for these reasons.
These buds are COMFORTABLE so long as they fit. I had my girlfriend try these and she said they weren’t great, but I can happily wear these for their entire battery life with no ear fatigue. 
Finally, these have the best transparency mode of any buds I’ve ever tried (I’ve owned 8 or 9 wireless buds at this point in my life) and it honestly feels like I’m not wearing anything. 


Negatives:
For what these buds are, they’re overpriced for sure. These should be about $150 max. 
The buds themselves only have 4 hour battery lives, which means if you’re someone who wears buds at work or some other public environment, you’re gonna have to charge em at some point. 
ANC isn’t great, if you’re in a noisy area, you’re gonna have to turn your music or media up quite a lot to actually drown the noise out. This IS to be expected but it’s still a bit of a downside (still the best “open ear” ANC on the market though). 


Overall I’d give these an 8/10. They sound pretty good as all airpods have, they’re well built, and they provide a strong package.
Personally, I like them more than the AirPods Pro 2 but these are overpriced. If you’re debating on these or the pros 2 and don’t care about price, get the Pros 2, but if you’re looking for a good set of buds WITH AN APPLE DEVICE while also trying to save a buck, these are a great choice. (Pics below conpared to Airpods Pro 2 and Samsung Buds Pro 2)

itemReviewed.name: Apple - AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation - White

name: Worth the upgrade
reviewBody: Love the fit of these over the airpods 3 they are a slightly smaller fit. Dont fall out of my ears & so comfortable over long periods of time. Definitely enjoying the new addition of the anc & transparency mode. They sound amazing with music and calls sound clear on the other end. If your looking to upgrade from older models definitely get these !!!

itemReviewed.name: Apple - AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation - White

name: Love it
reviewBody: The sound quality is awesome. The case is slimmer than my previous pair. They fit nicely in my ears. They are a little more expensive than I would have liked. Overall, I am satisfied.

results.reviewTitle: Apple AirPods 4 hands-on: It's hard to beat good active noise cancellation for under $180
